abstract.text: Integrate ARKit with low-level libraries and functionality.

legalNotices.copyright: Copyright © 2025 Apple Inc. All rights reserved.

inlineContent.text: ARKit in visionOS includes a full C API for compatibility with C and Objective-C apps and frameworks.

abstract.text: Integrate hardware sensing features to produce augmented reality apps and games.
